snippet.title: Devil’s Hideout Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
My horror point and click adventure Devil’s Hideout is out! Fully voiced in English!

Get it for 20% off during the launch week 👇
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2754530/Devils_Hideout/
